name: wine
description: A compatibility layer for running Windows programs
packages: wine-staging wine-gecko wine-mono wine-nine winetricks vkd3d lib32-vkd3d giflib lib32-giflib libpng lib32-libpng libldap lib32-libldap gnutls lib32-gnutls mpg123 lib32-mpg123 openal lib32-openal v4l-utils lib32-v4l-utils libpulse lib32-libpulse libgpg-error lib32-libgpg-error alsa-plugins lib32-alsa-plugins alsa-lib lib32-alsa-lib libjpeg-turbo lib32-libjpeg-turbo sqlite lib32-sqlite libxcomposite lib32-libxcomposite libxinerama lib32-libgcrypt libgcrypt lib32-libxinerama ncurses lib32-ncurses ocl-icd lib32-ocl-icd libxslt lib32-libxslt libva lib32-libva gtk3 lib32-gtk3 gst-plugins-base-libs lib32-gst-plugins-base-libs vulkan-icd-loader lib32-vulkan-icd-loader

name: mangohud
description: An overlay layer for monitoring FPS and more

name: gamemode
description: Allows to request a set of optimisations
custom:
groupadd -f gamemode; usermod -aG gamemode $username; sudo -u $username printf '[general]
reaper_freq=5
desiredgov=performance
igpu_desiredgov=powersave
igpu_power_threshold=0.3
renice=10
ioprio=0
inhibit_screensaver=1
' > /home/${username}/.config/gamemode.ini

name: protonup-qt
description: Install and manage runners form Steam and Lutris

name: steam-flatpak
custom: flatpak override --env=MANGOHUD=1 com.valvesoftware.Steam; flatpak override --filesystem=xdg-config/MangoHud:ro com.valvesoftware.Steam
